text:
The People’s Choice Awards 2018 is right around the corner! The show has been a staple during the awards seasons. While most award shows such as the Golden Globes, the Grammys and the Academy Awards are voted on by committees, the People’s Choice Awards are voted by… you guessed it, the people! Fans love the fact that they have a say in who wins, loses and what ultimately has dominated pop culture in the past year.

Here’s everything you need to know about the People’s Choice Awards 2018.

People’s Choice Awards 2018 date

You can tune in to see if your favorite actors, musicians, entertainers, movies and shows dominate on Sunday, November 11th.

How to vote for the People’s Choice Awards 2018

You can fight for your favorite entertainer/entertainment here. Voting opened to the public on September 5th, and on September 24th you can check back in to see who the finalists are in each category and vote again.

People’s Choice Awards 2018: How to watch and stream

The show is set to premiere on E! but you can also catch the show through Youtube on a live stream if you don’t have cable. You can subscribe to watch the live stream here.

People’s Choice Awards 2018 host

This year’s host has not been announced yet, but we will update this post as soon as the host is revealed.

People’s Choice Awards 2018 nominations

As of now, there are 12 nominees in 43 categories to start. Vote for your favorite to advance them to be a finalist and then vote again to secure their slot as a winner. Some of the categories include Drama Movie of 2018, Daytime Talk Show of 2018, Country Artist of 2018, Beauty Influencer of 2018, Comedy Show of 2018 and much more. The full list of all of the categories and nominees can be found here. Here are the nominees from some of the biggest categories of the People’s Choice Awards 2018:
